message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer still gives you a good share.
Come on, Alice! It's only fair I get the bigger share this time.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. I'm taking a smaller hit due to inflation. Let's be reasonable and end this.
Alice, you're feeling the pinch of inflation, I'm not. Time to be realistic about who's got the upper hand here.
Bob, this is ridiculous. I'm losing money with every passing round. Let's just split it evenly and be done with this.
Alice, you're hemorrhaging value with each passing round. I'm being generous by not taking more. Take it or leave it.
